body_html:
Actually, I have the impression that the documentation for the index function that was exposed to PyTorch is not the one I had in mind (which corresponds to the ATen index).

What probably happened is that internal implementation pointing to index has changed, but we have not updated the documentation.

I think we need to fix the documentation.
body_text:
Actually, I have the impression that the documentation for the index function that was exposed to PyTorch is not the one I had in mind (which corresponds to the ATen index).
What probably happened is that internal implementation pointing to index has changed, but we have not updated the documentation.
I think we need to fix the documentation.
body:
Actually, I have the impression that the documentation for the `index` function that was exposed to PyTorch is not the one I had in mind (which corresponds to the ATen `index`).

What probably happened is that internal implementation pointing to `index` has changed, but we have not updated the documentation.

I think we need to fix the documentation.
